boardgame.name: Mystery Express
boardgame.description: In Mystery Express, players board the famous Orient Express in Paris just as a murder occurs. The rest of the trip - through Strasbourg, Munich, Vienna, Budapest, and Istanbul - is consumed with determining the who, what, when, where, and why of the crime. This game explores the more analytical side of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;whodunit_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; genre, rewarding a logical and more precise approach to solving the crime._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players use their special powers of deduction, information gleaned from other passengers (and the conductor) in the train cars, and investigative actions to determine the exact circumstances of the murder. The player who correctly identifies the most elements of the crime by the time the train reaches Istanbul wins the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 4. A Train Journey With One Station Too Many? Mystery Express Reviewed
BGB Volume 78 - Mystery Express, Days of Steam, Super Circles, 7 Ate 9 and Run Wild
Love Talk with Kartok (Happy Valentine_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Day!)

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Game is in EXCELLENT condition. One piece arrived broken, but it has been repaired.

Days of Wonder - Mystery Express Language: English Players: 3 to 5 Age: 12+ Duration: 60 to 90 min Weight: 1.330 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Mystery Express is a new whodunit deduction game from Days of Wonder. The murder that takes place on the Orient Express incorporates 5 different elements - Motive, Location, Time, Modus Operandi, and Suspects - each of these is represented by a set of Crime cards. Players take on the role of one of 5 traveling characters, each who has their own special powers of deduction. The player who figures out the who, what, where, when and why of the murder before the end of the journey wins. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
